item.description:
Hi,

I asume most people will not be working on Saint Patrick's day so I am opening my doors to those who have the day off. Lets get together and have a potluck at my condo in Brookline. My address is 1731 Beacon street in Brookline off the C line. Get off at tapan street and you are right there. If you drive there is some parking, but bring quarters for the meters. Please let me know what you are bringing so I can plan accordingly.

thanks,
Katie
Assistant organizer

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Saint Patricks day Potluck
